item.title: Clovis BIOL11A Tutorials
item.description: PreLab Introduction to R This will open a web tutorial teaching the basics of R. Day 1 Lab Day 1 Lab Download this file and open it using RStudio. You may need to right-click the link and choose “Download File”. Day 2 Lab Day 2 Lab Download this file and open it using RStudio. You may need to right-click the link and choose “Download File”.
